name: Telegram-Airdrop-Bot
description: Very simple telegram airdrop bot with Heroku

AIRDROP_AMOUNT.description: How many tokens are you going to give? Example: 10000. Do not include ',' must be float number

AIRDROP_DATE.description: Date of reward distrubition. Example: 20 July 2021

AIRDROP_NETWORK.description: In which network/chain are you going to give? Example: Binance Smart Chain

BOT_TOKEN.description: The token you get from @BotFather. Example: 1313552295:AAFxDGKhlco-FoWw-uyxInotlKvalidNEz-Q

REFERRAL_REWARD.description: Extra reward participants will get for each referral. Example: 1000. Do not include ',' must be float number

ADMIN_USERNAME.description: Bot owner's telegram username. Example: johndoe

MAX_USERS.description: Maximum number of participants. Example: 1000. Do not include ',' must be float number

MAX_REFS.description: Maximum number of referrals per participant. Example: 5

CAPTCHA_ENABLED.description: Enable or disable captcha at start. Example: YES or NO

TWITTER_LINKS.description: Twitter page links seperated by comma. Single Example: https://twitter.com/bitcoin. Multiple Example: https://twitter.com/bitcoin,https://twitter.com/ethereum

TELEGRAM_LINKS.description: Twitter page links seperated by comma. Single Example: https://t.me/single. Multiple Example: https://t.me/multi,https://t.me/ple

DISCORD_LINKS.description: Discord server links seperated by comma. Single Example: https://discord.gg/example. Multiple Example: https://discord.gg/example,https://discord.gg/ple

DB_URI.description: Get one from https://cloud.mongodb.com/. Replace <username> and <password>. Example: mongodb+srv://<username>:<password>@cluster0.abcde.mongodb.net/myFirstDatabase?retryWrites=true&w=majority
